column2: Call upon the power of darkness, should it prove necessary, even if it might arouse suspicion

It would not be a proper Lunar New Year celebration without a dragon dance happening during it. Of course, there are different opinions as to just how many dragons there should be, and I will need to make a decision about that.
I want the smallest dragon possible!
Get me a regular-sized dragon!
Two dragons are better than one!
I want the full nine dragons!

While part of the Lunar New Year celebration will be private and only feature me and my highborn guests, doing something extra to entertain the townspeople might not be a bad idea. I could hire some musicians to do just that.
That seems like a good idea
I would rather save the money

Hiring some acrobats to entertain me and my guests might help spice up the Lunar New Year celebration. Of course, they are not considered as essential as some other parts of the festivities, so I could decide against them.
Acrobats? Sign me up!
I think not!

Much like the dragon dance, fireworks are considered essential during the Lunar New Year celebration. The amount of fireworks that would be proper is hard to determine, and it mainly comes down to how much money the host wishes to spend.
I don't want to spend a lot...
I can afford a decent amount!
I will aim for a few extra...
I want as many as possible!

In addition to the dragon dance it is possible to also hire some entertainers to perform a lion dance. This is generally consdiered less important, but it could still make the celebration of the Lunar New Year more memorable for my guests.
I want there to be lion dances!
I'd rather save the money...

In order for the Lunar New Year celebration to be as good as possible it might be a good idea to invest in decorations. However, considering all the other expenses it is perhaps something I could spend less on, if I so desire.
I should save the money...
Some decorations would be nice...
I want a lot of decorations!

While it is not a tradition that is practiced everywhere there are those that hand out red envelopes filled with money during the Lunar New Year without either the giver or the recipient knowing which guest gets which package. Perhaps I should consider doing this.
Yes! Let's do that!
I have no intention to give away my money!
With most of the preparations out of the way I need to decide on how much food I wish to serve my guests during the Lunar New Year celebration.
As nearly everything has been prepared it is high time to send out invitations for the guests. It is only right and proper for all of my vassals to be invited.

[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing], I hereby invite you to my Lunar New Year celebration. Let us welcome the Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac] together!

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetBestName]
I'll be there!
As if I would attend!
My liege, I have no intention to take part in your Lunar New Year celebration. I have more important matters to attend to.\n\nBy my hand and seal,[From.GetBestName]

It is customary to ensure tha your home is cleaned before the Lunar New Year to ensure good luck, and I should probably consider making sure that that is seen to. However, with all the rest of the preparations I have made, perhaps I could be excused for not cleaning properly.
Everything must be properly cleaned!
I'll have someone clean a little...
A little dirt never hurt anyone...
In the Light of Red Lanters

[Root.Capital.GetName] is in a festive mood as the Year of the [Root.GetOldElement] [Root.GetOldZodiac] is coming to an end and the Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac] is about to begin. The townspeople are out in the streets, dancing, drinking, and laughing, with performers on nearly every street corner.

Despite the celebration of the Lunar New Year only just beginning the sky is still lit by the occasional firework as the more eager -- or perhaps the more drunken -- celebrants see no need to wait.

The guests have started to arrive, coming from far and wide, and I am certain that my servants soon will have their hands full with their demands. As far as I can tell, everything is in readiness,. I should probably feel free to relax and join the festivities, as long as I remember to greet my guests.
Wishing you prosperity!
In the Light of Red Lanters

[From.Capital.GetName] is in a festive mood as the Year of the [Root.GetOldElement] [Root.GetOldZodiac] is coming to an end and the Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac] is about to begin. The townspeople are out in the streets, dancing, drinking, and laughing, with performers on nearly every street corner.

Despite the celebration of the Lunar New Year only just beginning the sky is still lit by the occasional firework as the more eager -- or perhaps the more drunken -- celebrants see no need to wait.

It is unlikely that all of the guests have had the time to arrive yet, but I still need to wait on a few other people before I am greeted by [From.GetBestName] upon my arriva.

"Wishing you prosperity!" [From.GetSheHe] exclaims, though it is hard to be sure if it is only due to tradition.
Wishing you prosperity!
May you live in interesting times!
Happy New Year!
It is considered a good start to the new year if your home is clean, and [From.GetBestName] has certainly made sure that [From.GetHerHis] home is clean.
How auspicious!
I don't really care...
It seems [From.GetBestName] has taken note of how clean my home is, as [From.GetSheHe] has been overheard expressing [From.GetHerHis] approval.
I'm glad you like it!

It is considered a good start to the new year if your home is clean, but [From.GetBestName] does not seem to have bothered with it. I have noticed a good amount of dirt in several places inside the rooms that have been set aside for me and my fellow guests.
How inauspicious!
I've seen worse...

It seems the cleaning that was done prior to the celebrations was insufficient. Some of my servants have reported that [From.GetBestName] has been heard complaining about it. Perhaps it would have been wise to have made more of an effort to clean.
I didn't think anyone would notice...

While it is possible to miss some dirt while cleaning it is clear to me that [From.GetBestName] has not even tried to give [From.GetHerHis] home a proper cleaning before the Lunar New Year celebration began.
Most inauspicious!
It would be rude to complain...

Though I suspected that there might be disparaging comments directed at my servants due to the lack of cleaning I was quite surprised by [From.GetBestName] going so far as to loudly complain about it and to put the blame on me alone.
Perhaps I should have made more of an effort...

I had noticed that some parts of [FromFrom.GetBestName]'s home were a bit less clean than expected, but it is not until [From.GetBestName] publicly accuses [FromFrom.GetBestName] of not bothering to clean at all that I come to realize the true extent of the uncleanliness.
Most inauspicious!

[From.GetBestName] has clearly invested a lot of money into making sure that the food at the Lunar New Year celebration is anything but sparse. I barely have time to finish my second dessert before a servant comes around and offers me a third.
This is most agreeable!
This is incredibly wasteful!
Does it really matter?

The food at [From.GetBestName]'s Lunar New Year celebration is filling and not bland, but it is still rather unremarkable compared to what I have had during other celebrations. A servant lets me know that there will only be a single dessert, not two or more.

While there is food to be found at [From.GetBestName]'s Lunar New Year celebration it is clear that there has not been a lot invested into it, as the portions are quite small and the taste is bland. There is not even a single dessert, to my great surprise.

It seems the choice of food at my Lunar New Year celebration pleased [From.GetBestName] as [From.GetSheHe] has been heard asking the servants to pass along [From.GetHerHis] compliments to the kitchens and a request for some recipes.
Good to hear!

Apparently the food at my Lunar New Year celebration was not to everyone's liking. [From.GetBestName] has been complaining about it throughout the evening, even going as far as to suggest that I do not know how to hire a proper kitchen staff.
Cease your complaining!

[From.Capital.GetName] is extensively decorated for the Lunar New Year celebration, and it is clear that [From.GetBestName] has spared no expense to make certain that it is aesthetically pleasing. Clearly, [From.GetSheHe] has a good grasp of Feng Shui, or perhaps the sense to pay someone that is.
How auspicious!
That's rather unremarkable...

It seems [From.GetBestName] approves of the decorations for my Lunar New Year celebration as [From.GetSheHe] just complimented my taste and my grasp of Feng Shui. Though it was not inexpensive, the investment seems to have paid off.
I'm glad you approve!

When looking at the decorations for the Lunar New celebration in [From.Capital.GetName] I realize that they are rather poor and that their placement leaves a lot to be desired. It is as if [From.GetBestName] never has heard of the concept of Feng Shui.
How inauspicious!
It isn't that bad...

My choice of decorations for the Lunar New Year celebration apparently leave something to be desired as far as [From.GetBestName] is concerned. In fact, [From.GetSheHe] has been overheard suggesting that I have never heard of Feng Shui.
Shut up!

Though the Lunar New Year celebration in [Root.Capital.GetName] is the perfect opportunity for me to relax it is also an opportunity for learning. My grasp of stewardship is not that great, but I know that [lny_stewardship_teacher.GetName] has some skill in that area. Perhaps I should ask [lny_stewardship_teacher.GetHerHim] for a lesson?
It wouldn't hurt to ask...
Let's not bother [lny_stewardship_teacher.GetHerHim]...

MY liege, [From.GetBestName], approaches me in private during the Lunar New Year celebration to ask if I would consider giving [From.GetHerHim] a quick lesson concerning matters of stewardship, as [From.GetSheHe] has heard that I am well versed in the field.
I would be happy to help!
I'd rather take it easy...
I'll teach [From.GetHerHim] a lesson, to be sure...

[From.GetBestName] was open to giving me a few quick pointers regarding matters of stewardship, and I find that I have a somewhat better grasp of the subject after the lesson, which surely will be a benefit during the Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac].
This is to my liking!

It seems [From.GetBestName] would prefer to relax during the Lunar New Year celebration as [From.GetSheHe] tells me that [From.GetSheHe] would prefer not to give any lessons on the subject of stewardship for the time being.
Not what I wanted to hear...

I am quite pleased to hear that [From.GetBestName] is willing to teach me a lesson and leave the meeting certain that I will be able to use what [From.GetSheHe] taught me. Unfortunately, I quickly discover that [From.GetBestName]'s advice was very poor, quite possibly intentionally so.
How rude!

Though the Lunar New Year celebration in [From.Capital.GetName] is a perfect opportunity for me to relax it is also an opportunity for learning. My grasp of stewardship is not that great, but I know that [lny_stewardship_teacher.GetName] has some skill in that area. Perhaps I should ask [lny_stewardship_teacher.GetHerHim] for a lesson?
It wouldn't hurt to ask...
Let's not bother [lny_stewardship_teacher.GetHerHim]...

[From.GetBestName] approaches me in private during the Lunar New Year celebration to ask if I would consider giving [From.GetHerHim] a quick lesson concerning matters of stewardship, as [From.GetSheHe] has heard that I am well versed in the field.
I would be happy to help!
I'd rather take it easy...
I'll teach [From.GetHerHim] a lesson, to be sure...

[From.GetBestName] was open to giving me a few quick pointers regarding matters of stewardship, and I find that I have a somewhat better grasp of the subject after the lesson, which surely will be a benefit during the Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac].
This is to my liking!

It seems [From.GetBestName] would prefer to relax during the Lunar New Year celebration as [From.GetSheHe] tells me that [From.GetSheHe] would prefer not to give any lessons on the subject of stewardship for the time being.
Not what I wanted to hear...

I am quite pleased to hear that [From.GetBestName] is willing to teach me a lesson and leave the meeting certain that I will be able to use what [From.GetSheHe] taught me. Unfortunately, I quickly discover that [From.GetBestName]'s advice was very poor, quite possibly intentionally so.
How rude!

As the celebration of the Lunar New Year gets underway one of my servants comes to me with a message from a [Root.Religion.GetName] shrine in [Root.Capital.GetName]. It seems the keepers of the shrine have heard of the celebration and are wishing me a most prosperous Year of the [Root.GetNewZodiac].
Auspicious!
[Root.GetSonDaughterCap] of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac]

I have seen many Lunar New Year celebrations since my birth during the Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac]. Though there have been years when the zodiac or the element has been the same as during year of my birth, the same combination only happens once every sixty years.\n\nAs the Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac] is about to begin once more I receive word from several shrines in [Root.Capital.GetName] that they wish me a most prosperous new year and that they hope that I will live long enough to experience yet another full cycle of years.
Most auspicious!
[From.GetSonDaughterCap] of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac]

[From.GetBestName] was born many years ago during the Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac], and that same alignment is once more taking place, which only happens every sixty years. It does not surprise me to hear that congratulations have been sent from some shrines in [From.Capital.GetName], along with wishes of prosperity for [From.GetBestName].\n\nSeveral of the guests at the Lunar New Year celebration are quick to add their own well-wishes to those from the shrine, and it makes sense for me to add my own to theirs as this is a special occasion.
Wishing you prosperity!

It seems the musicians I hired to entertain the townspeople in [Root.Capital.GetName] during the Lunar New Year celebration were not as good as they claimed that they were. Their instruments are poorly tuned and the singers are frequently off-key and sometimes mess up the lyrics, with the result being highly unpleasant.
I want my money back!

The musicians I hired for the Lunar New Year celebration have apparently performed above and beyond what could be expected of them as I am informed that the townspeople are speaking especially highly of me after the performance.
Just as planned!

Though I arranged for some musicians to entertain the townspeople in [Root.Capital.GetName] before the Lunar New Year celebration started they have failed to show up. Upon further investigation it seems they have decided to take my money and depart for places unknown.
Thieves!

The acrobats at [From.GetBestName]'s Lunar New Year celebration are quite skilled at their job and I find myself watching the show with with interest, which is replaced with disappointment when I realize that the show is coming to an end.
Please stay a while longer!
I've seen better...

It seems [From.GetBestName] really enjoyed watching the acrobats I hired for my Lunar New Year celebration as [From.GetSheHe] could be heard asking them to stick around a while longer when they were about to leave.
Good to hear!

The acrobats I hired put on a good show for me and my guests and took their leave quickly once it was over. Shortly thereafter the captain of my guards came to me to inform you that someone had entered my quarters through the window and stolen some valuables. It does not take me long to realize that the acrobats probably did it.
Thieves!

As I head elsewhere after watching the acrobats at [From.GetBestName]'s Lunar New Year celebration I find one of them approaching me. At first I fear an attack, but instead the man merely speaks, suggesting that I should distract [lny_burglar_target.GetBestName] so that the acrobats can steal from [lny_burglar_target.GetHerHim]. I am promised a reward for my trouble.
Sounds like a plan!
I think not!

I return to my quarters after having watched the acrobats but barely have time to arrive before I am told that [From.GetBestName] wishes to see me. After speaking to [From.GetHerHim] regarding a trivial matter I venture back into my chambers only to realize that someone has broken into them and stolen some valuables.
Curses!

The man that approached me asking for me to distract [lny_burglar_target.GetBestName] comes to find me later in the evening, a smile on his face.\n\n"My [Root.GetLordLady], your distraction was most excellent! As promised, here is your share of the spoils." The man hands over some coins and then disappears into the night.
A job well done!

I am on my way back to my quarters when [From.GetBestName] comes running up to me asking to speak to me. It turns out that the discussion is about various trivialties and I start looking for an excuse to leave when one of the guards I brought with me to the celebration comes running to inform me that someone attempted to enter my room but was chased off by the guards.
I wonder who sent them?

As I am conversing with [lny_burglar_target.GetBestName] with the intention of keeping [lny_burglar_target.GetHerHim] away from [From.GetHerHis] quarters one of [From.GetHerHis] guards comes running and informs [From.GetHerHim] that some burglars were chased off. Apparently my distraction was insufficient.
At least they got away...

As I return to my quarters I hear the sound of someone falling in through the window. I quickly summon my guards, and they manage to catch one of the acrobats from the Lunar New Year celebration before he can escape. The man is swiftly interrogated to reveal the identity of any co-conspirators.
He was working with [From.GetBestName]!

I am pondering how best to distract [lny_burglar_target.GetBestName] when one of my servants comes to find me. Apparently the acrobats got impatient and one of their number entered [lny_burglar_target.GetBestName]'s quarters without waiting for the distraction. Even worse, the man got caught and divulged my name when questioned.
I had nothing to do with it!

Shortly after the acrobats are done with their performance at the Lunar New Year celebration I learn that some of them attempted to break into the quarters of [lny_burglar_target.GetBestName] but got caught once inside. Apparently the man divulged the name of [From.GetBestName] as a possible co-conspirator, though [From.GetSheHe] claims to be innocent.
I'm not sure who to trust...
One of the acrobats at the Lunar New Year celebration is rather fetching. She seems to have quite a few admirers in the crowd, even if she does not seem to have much interest in them.
I should not bother her...
I should proposition her!

I and [pretty_acrobat.GetBestName] sneak away from the crowds and find a seclueded area where we can get to know one another much more intimately. A while later, as we're getting dressed again, she asks me what I think the future holds.
I doubt we'll ever meet again...
You're welcome to stay!
You should be my concubine!

[pretty_acrobat.GetBestName] does not seem particularly interested in me when I attempt to gain her attention, and when I finally manage to get my suggestion across she quickly makes it abundantly clear that she is not interested in me.
You don't know what you're missing!
One of the acrobats at the Lunar New Year celebration is rather fetching. He seems to have quite a few admirers in the crowd, even if he does not seem to have much interest in them.
I should not bother him...
I should proposition him!

I and [pretty_acrobat.GetBestName] sneak away from the crowds and find a seclueded area where we can get to know one another much more intimately. A while later, as we're getting dressed again, he asks me what I think the future holds.
I doubt we'll ever meet again...
You're welcome to stay!
You should be my consort!

[pretty_acrobat.GetBestName] does not seem particularly interested in me when I attempt to gain his attention, and when I finally manage to get my suggestion across he quickly makes it abundantly clear that he is not interested in me.
You don't know what you're missing!

While it is a less important part of the Lunar New Year celebration than the dragon dance I had still been looking forward to seeing a lion dance. However, when asking when the lion dancers might show up I am informed that there apparently will not be any at this particular Lunar New Year celebration in [From.Capital.GetName].
I'll complain to [From.GetBestName]!
It is not that important...

It turns out my choice not to hire some lion dance troupes was not entirely a popular one, as [From.GetBestName] comes up to me to voice [From.GetHerHis] displeasure over the fact that there will not be any at my Lunar New Year celebration.
You can't please everyone...

As is customary when there are lion dance troupes at a Lunar New Year celebration there is lettuce hung fifteen or more feet above the ground in various places in [From.Capital.GetName] for the lion dancers to try to reach. At one point during the celebrations I see two different lions aproaching the same lettuce, making ready to fight.
I'll place a bet!
I'd rather not gamble...

The two lion dance troupes square off in ritual combat over the lettuce under my watchful gaze. It is a close fight, and for a moment I think the lion I am betting on will be the loser, but then the battle quickly turns in its favour and the troupe in question is given the right to the lettuce.
I know a winner when I see them!

The two lion dance troupes square off in ritual combat over the lettuce under my watchful gaze. It is a close fight, and for a moment I think the lion I am betting on will be the winner, but then the battle quickly turns against it and it is forced to withdraw while the other lion gets the lettuce.
That was unfortunate...

It seems some of the lion dance troupes at the Lunar New Year celebration have decided to try something a bit different as they have erected several tall poles holding small circular platforms for them to perform on. However, as the performance is about to begin there are a few troupes that find themselves a person short.
I can fill in for one person!
I'd rather watch...

I take the place of one of the missing lion dancers and the performance begins. Though it is not something I am accustomed to I find myself getting the hang of what I am supposed to be doing easily enough, and towards the end my lion is declared the winner.
Victory is mine!

I take the place of one of the missing lion dancers and the performance begins. It is not something I am familiar with, and I struggle a bit before getting the hang of it. Though I later hear that my performance was adequate I find that another lion was declared the winner.
I suppose I shouldn't be surprised...

I take the place of one of the missing lion dancers and the performance begins. It is not something I am familiar with, and I struggle a bit before I think I have gotten the hang of it. However, it turns out I am mistaken and I am sent tumbling to the ground, injuring myself in the process.
Ow!

I take the place of one of the missing lion dancers and the performance begins. It is extremely unfamiliar, and I struggle valiantly to perform. One misstep is all it takes for ne to fall off the platform I was standing on, dragging the other dancer with me and injuring myself quite severely.
Curses!

[From.GetTitledName] has seen fit to give a red envelope to each guest at [From.GetHerHis] Lunar New Year celebration, containing an unknown amount of money. To my displeasure I discover that there is no money at all to be found in the envelope I was given.
Nothing? Really?

[From.GetTitledName] has seen fit to give a red envelope to each guest at [From.GetHerHis] Lunar New Year celebration, containing an unknown amount of money. To my displeasure I discover that the sum of money in my envelope was miniscule.
That's all?

[From.GetTitledName] has seen fit to give a red envelope to each guest at [From.GetHerHis] Lunar New Year celebration, containing an unknown amount of money. MY envelope does not contain a large amount of money, but at least it could have been worse.
I suppose that was acceptable...

[From.GetTitledName] has seen fit to give a red envelope to each guest at [From.GetHerHis] Lunar New Year celebration, containing an unknown amount of money. I discover that my envelope contains far more money than expected once I have opened it.
I think I got lucky!

Though the Lunar New Year celebration in [Root.Capital.GetName] is a perfect opportunity for me to relax it is also an opportunity for learning. My grasp of learning is not that great, but I know that [lny_learning_teacher.GetName] has some skill in that area. Perhaps I should ask [lny_learning_teacher.GetHerHim] for a lesson?
It wouldn't hurt to ask...
Let's not bother [lny_stewardship_teacher.GetHerHim]...

My liege, [From.GetBestName], approaches me in private during the Lunar New Year celebration to ask if I would consider giving [From.GetHerHim] a quick lesson concerning matters of learning, as [From.GetSheHe] has heard that I am well versed in the field.
I would be happy to help!
I'd rather take it easy...
I'll teach [From.GetHerHim] a lesson, to be sure...
This is to my liking!

It seems [From.GetBestName] would prefer to relax during the Lunar New Year celebration as [From.GetSheHe] tells me that [From.GetSheHe] would prefer not to give any lessons on the subject of learning for the time being.
Not what I wanted to hear...

I am quite pleased to hear that [From.GetBestName] is willing to teach me a lesson and leave the meeting certain that I will be able to use what [From.GetSheHe] taught me. Unfortunately, I quickly discover that [From.GetBestName]'s advice was very poor, quite possibly intentionally so.
How rude!

Though the Lunar New Year celebration in [From.Capital.GetName] is a perfect opportunity for me to relax it is also an opportunity for learning. My grasp of learning is not that great, but I know that [lny_learning_teacher.GetName] has some skill in that area. Perhaps I should ask [lny_learning_teacher.GetHerHim] for a lesson?
It wouldn't hurt to ask...
Let's not bother [lny_stewardship_teacher.GetHerHim]...

[From.GetBestName] approaches me in private during the Lunar New Year celebration to ask if I would consider giving [From.GetHerHim] a quick lesson concerning matters of learning, as [From.GetSheHe] has heard that I am well versed in the field.
I would be happy to help!
I'd rather take it easy...
I'll teach [From.GetHerHim] a lesson, to be sure...

[From.GetBestName] was open to giving you a few quick pointers regarding matters of learning, and I find that I have a somewhat better grasp of the subject after the lesson, which surely will be a benefit during the Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac].
This is to my liking!

It seems [From.GetBestName] would prefer to relax during the Lunar New Year celebration as [From.GetSheHe] tells me that [From.GetSheHe] would prefer not to give any lessons on the subject of learning for the time being.
Not what I wanted to hear...

I am quite pleased to hear that [From.GetBestName] is willing to teach me a lesson and leave the meeting certain that I will be able to use what [From.GetSheHe] taught me. Unfortunately, I quickly discover that [From.GetBestName]'s advice was very poor, quite possibly intentionally so.
How rude!

With some Lunar New Year celebrations coming under attack from a dragon in the past, it might be prudent to consider whether some more guards would be in order. It is of course far from certain that my celebration will be in any danger, but gambling on that might prove... unwise...
I will hire more guards!
I'll take the risk!

As the Lunar New Year celebration in [Root.Capital.GetName] continues one of the servants comes running and tells everyone to look to the sky. Though hard to make out the serpentine body of a celestial dragon can be seen in the distance. It does not seem intent on approaching, but it is still a sight to behold.
Auspicious!

As the Lunar New Year celebration in [From.Capital.GetName] continues one of the servants comes running and tells everyone to look to the sky. Though hard to make out the serpentine body of a celestial dragon can be seen in the distance. It does not seem intent on approaching, but it is still a sight to behold.
Auspicious!

As the Lunar New Year celebration in [Root.Capital.GetName] continues I suddenly spot something moving high in the air above and turn my gaze to the sky. I can see the serpentine body of a celestial dragon peeking through the clouds. It is hard to be certain, but it seems to linger for a moment, as if pleased by what it sees.
Most auspicious!

As the Lunar New Year celebration in [From.Capital.GetName] continues I suddenly spot something moving high in the air above and turn my gaze to the sky. I can see the serpentine body of a celestial dragon peeking through the clouds. It is hard to be certain, but it seems to linger for a moment, as if pleased by what it sees.
Most auspicious!

As the Lunar New Year celebration in [Root.Capital.GetName] continues I suddenly see the serpentine shape of a celestial dragon approaching from the distance. However, as it draws closer arrows fly up to meet it from the walls and it turns around. Apparently the guards choose not to take any risks.
Inauspicious!

As the Lunar New Year celebration in [From.Capital.GetName] continues I suddenly see the serpentine shape of a celestial dragon approaching from the distance. However, as it draws closer arrows fly up to meet it from the walls and it turns around. Apparently the guards choose not to take any risks.
Inauspicious!
A Heavenly Guest

As the Lunar New Year celebration in [Root.Capital.GetName] continues I suddenly see a celestial dragon approaching from the distance. As it draws closer arrows fly up to meet it, which does not seem to deter it. The dragon lands near me and looks at me, an expression of displeasure on its face.

"I came here to offer a boon to you, [Root.GetBestName]," the dragon says, "but if this is how you would treat a guest such as myself you are not worthy of it. In the future, consider the instructions you give your guards more carefully."

With that, the dragon rises back into the air and departs.
Most inauspicious!
A Heavenly Guest

As the Lunar New Year celebration in [From.Capital.GetName] continues I suddenly see a celestial dragon approaching from the distance. As it draws closer arrows fly up to meet it, which does not seem to deter it. The dragon lands near [From.GetBestName] and looks at [From.GetHerHim], an expression of displeasure on its face.

"I came here to offer a boon to you, [From.GetBestName]," the dragon says, "but if this is how you would treat a guest such as myself you are not worthy of it. In the future, consider the instructions you give your guards more carefully."

With that, the dragon rises back into the air and departs.
Most inauspicious!
A Heavenly Guest

As the Lunar New Year celebration in [Root.Capital.GetName] continues I suddenly see a celestial dragon approaching from the distance. Everyone watches in silence as it approaches, awed by its majestic appearance. The dragon lands near me and looks at me, a pleased expression on its face.\n\n"It is good to see that you see fit to celebrate the end of the Year of the [Root.GetOldElement] [Root.GetOldZodiac] and the beginning of the Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac], [Root.GetBestName]," the dragon says. "Is there any boon you would ask of me? I assure you, if you are worthy of it you shall receive it."
Your august presence enough!
Bless my armies!
Bless me with strength!
Grant me health!
Grant me fertility!
Make my realm prosper!
Grant me wisdom!
Bless me with intelligence!
Bless my rule!
A Heavenly Guest

As the Lunar New Year celebration in [From.Capital.GetName] continues -i suddenly see a celestial dragon approaching from the distance. The dragon lands near [From.GetBestName] and looks at [From.GetHerHim], a pleased expression on its face. "It is good to see that you see fit to celebrate the end of the Year of the [Root.GetOldElement] [Root.GetOldZodiac] and the beginning of the Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac], [From.GetBestName]," the dragon says. "Is there any boon you would ask of me? I assure you, if you are worthy of it you shall receive it."
Truly an auspicious day!

Strength of arms is certainly a boon you are worthy of, the dragon replies after the request is made. "Very well, [Root.GetBestName], you shall have my blessing." Nothing appears to happen at first, but suddenly I start to grasp military concepts that once would have been incomprehensible.
Thank you, oh mighty dragon!

Strength of arms is certainly a boon you are worthy of, the dragon replies after the request is made. "Very well, [From.GetBestName], you shall have my blessing." Nothing appears to happen at first, but suddenly [From.GetBestName] is thanking the dragon profusely, seemingly having received the boon.
Truly a powerful boon!

If it is strength you desire, [Root.GetBestName], then strength you shall have, the dragon replies after the request is made. Nothing appears to happen at first, but suddenly I feel my muscles bulge a bit and I am filled with the certainty that I have received my desired boon.
Thank you, oh mighty dragon!

If it is strength you desire, [From.GetBestName], then strength you shall have, the dragon replies after the request is made. Nothing appears to happen at first, but suddenly [From.GetBestName] appears to become slightly more muscular and [From.GetSheHe] starts thanking the dragon profusely.
Truly a powerful boon!

There are those that would not consider health to be a worthwhile boon, the dragon replies after the request is made. "It pleases me that you are not one of them, [Root.GetBestName], and you shall have your boon." Nothing seems to happen at first, but soon I find my body filling with renewed vigor.
Thank you, oh mighty dragon!

There are those that would not consider health to be a worthwhile boon, the dragon replies after the request is made. "It pleases me that you are not one of them, [From.GetBestName], and you shall have your boon." Nothing seems to happen at first, but then [From.GetBestName] suddenly looks more energetic.
Truly a powerful boon!

A large family is a happy family, and it is only fitting that you should be blessed with the capacity for one, [Root.GetBestName], the dragon replies after the request is made. Nothing seems to happen at first, but soon I find my body filling with renewed vigor.
Thank you, oh mighty dragon!

A large family is a happy family, and it is only fitting that you should be blessed with the capacity for one, [From.GetBestName], the dragon replies after the request is made Nothing seems to happen at first, but [From.GetBestName] suddenly looks more energetic and [From.GetSheHe] starts thanking the dragon profusely.
Truly a powerful boon!

[Root.GetBestName], it is certainly fitting for you to have a prosperous realm, and I will make it so, the dragon replies after the request is made. I am not certain why, but I suddenly feel confident that the boon has been granted and that I will discover how before long.
Thank you, oh mighty dragon!

[From.GetBestName], it is certainly fitting for you to have a prosperous realm, and I will make it so, the dragon replies after the request is made. As far as -I can tell, nothing happens, but [From.GetBestName] suddenly starts thanking the dragon profusely, so seemingly the boon has been granted.
Truly a powerful boon!

Ah, wisdom, the dragon replies after the request is made. "It is a powerful boon indeed, and not something I would grant everyone. You, [Root.GetTitledName], are certainly worthy of it." I quickly feel new insights flooding into my mind as it finishes speaking.
Thank you, oh mighty dragon!

Ah, wisdom, the dragon replies after the request is made. "It is a powerful boon indeed, and not something I would grant everyone. You, [From.GetTitledName], are certainly worthy of it." Given that [From.GetBestName] suddenly starts thanking the dragon profusely, it seems to have had some effect.
Truly a powerful boon!

It is more common for someone to ask for physical strength than a sound mind, but a sound mind is indeed better at times, the dragon replies after the request is made. "Very well, [Root.GetBestName]. You shall have your boon." I can feel my mind suddenly become clearer almost as quickly as it stops speaking.
Thank you, oh mighty dragon!

It is more common for someone to ask for physical strength than a sound mind, but a sound mind is indeed better at times, the dragon replies after the request is made. "Very well, [From.GetBestName]. You shall have your boon." Though I cannot see a noticeable change [From.GetBestName] seems quite satisfied.
Truly a powerful boon!

Should there be those that doubt that your rule is rightful, [Root.GetBestName], you may tell them that it has my blessing, the dragon replies after the request is made. It turns its gaze to my guests before continuing. "You have heard my words, and I trust that you will keep them in mind and honor your obligations to your liege!"
Thank you, oh mighty dragon!

Should there be those that doubt that your rule is rightful, [From.GetBestName], you may tell them that it has my blessing, the dragon replies after the request is made. It turns its gaze to me and the other guests before continuing. "You have heard my words, and I trust that you will keep them in mind and honor your obligations to your liege!"
Truly a powerful boon!

You are unworthy of the boon you have requested, [Root.GetBestName], the dragon replies after the request is made. "That you presume to ask for it at all makes me wonder what other unwise decisions you make as a ruler." With that, it leaps gracefully into the air and flies off without another word.
I don't understand!

You are unworthy of the boon you have requested, [From.GetBestName], the dragon replies after the request is made. "That you presume to ask for it at all makes me wonder what other unwise decisions you make as a ruler." With that, it leaps gracefully into the air and flies off without another word.
Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] is unfit to rule?

One of the servants at the Lunar New Year celebration comes running and claims that some of the townspeople have seen a dragon in the sky. However, instead of being serpentine and wingless this dragon was supposedly winged and more lizardline, and it supposedly had glowing silvery scales.
Maybe it was just a bird...

One of the servants at the Lunar New Year celebration comes running and claims that some of the townspeople have seen a dragon in the sky. However, instead of being serpentine and wingless this dragon was supposedly winged and more lizardline, and it supposedly had glowing silvery scales.
Maybe it was just a bird...

Celestial dragons are known for being wingless and serpentine, and sightings of such majestic creatures are considered auspicious. However, while a silvery dragon flew past the Lunar New Year celebration in [Root.Capital.GetName] it was most certainly neither serpentine nor wingless.
Worrisome...

Celestial dragons are known for being wingless and serpentine, and sightings of such majestic creatures are considered auspicious. However, while a silvery dragon flew past the Lunar New Year celebration in [From.Capital.GetName] it was most certainly neither serpentine nor wingless.
Worrisome...

One of the guards comes running in the middle of the Lunar New Year celebrations, shouting that a dragon sought to reach me but that it was driven off. At first I fear that the guards drove off a celestial dragon, but I am quickly assured that the silvery creature was winged and not serpentine.
They probably did the right thing...

One of the guards comes running in the middle of the Lunar New Year celebrations, shouting that a dragon sought to reach [From.GetBestName] but that it was driven off. At first I fear that the guards drove off a celestial dragon, but the silvery creature is described as winged and not serpentine.
They probably did the right thing...
The Champion of Justice

The Lunar New Year celebrations are interrupted by shouting and the appearance of a silvery dragon that is not particularly serpentine and that has two large wings. Some guards fire arrows at the creature, but they have no effect. The dragon lands gratefully in front of you, a displeased expression on its face.\n\n"I am Icava, the Champion of Justice," it says, the voice feminine. "I came here to fight a great evil." Its gaze sweeps across my guests as it says that, seemingly lingering on [smite_evil_target.GetBestName] for a moment. "However, since you dare have your guards attack me it seems it is you I should fight!"
Please let me explain!
I do not fear you, dragon!
You underestimate my POWER!
The Champion of Justice

The Lunar New Year celebrations are interrupted by shouting and the appearance of a silvery dragon that is not particularly serpentine and that has two large wings. Some guards fire arrows at the creature, but they have no effect and the dragon lands gratefully in front of [From.GetBestName], a displeased expression on its face.\n\n"I am Icava, the Champion of Justice," it says, the voice feminine. "I came here to fight a great evil." Its gaze sweeps across the guests as it says that, seemingly lingering for a moment. "However, since you dare have your guards attack me it seems it is you I should fight!"
Am I the target?
Who could this "great evil" be?

I apologize for my previous outburst, the dragon says after contemplating my words for a moment. "I acted rashly, and a knight should know better."\n\nShe gracefully leaps into the air after saying that and flies off into the distance.
Great to hear!

I apologize for my previous outburst, the dragon says after contemplating [From.GetBestName]'s words for a moment. "I acted rashly, and a knight should know better."\n\nShe gracefully leaps into the air after saying that and flies off into the distance.
Well spoken, [From.GetBestName]!

Your words are disrespectful, but you clearly are misguided rather than evil, the dragon says after contemplating my words for a moment. "I shall depart, for now. Look for the evil among you, and instruct your guards more carefully in the future!"
Well, at least she left...

Your words are disrespectful, but you clearly are misguided rather than evil, the dragon says after contemplating [From.GetBestName]'s words for a moment. "I shall depart, for now. Look for the evil among you, and instruct your guards more carefully in the future!"
It could have been worse...

The battle between me and the dragon is a close thing, but eventually I seem to be getting the upper hand and start driving her back despite her much larger size.

"It seems I shall have to choose the better part of valor," she suddenly says, leaping into the air quite gracefully. "Until we meet again!"

With that, she flies off into the distance.
Good riddance!

The battle between [From.GetBestName] and the dragon is a close thing, but eventually [From.GetBestName] seems to be getting the upper hand.

"It seems I shall have to choose the better part of valor," the dragon suddenly says, leaping into the air quite gracefully. "Until we meet again!"

With that, she flies off into the distance.
Good riddance!

It quickly becomes clear that I stand no chance against the dragon, and she inflects several wounds on me before long.

"I shall spare your life this time, despite your attack on me," she suddenly says, inflicting one final wound before leaping into the air quite gracefully. "Until we meet again!"

With that, she flies off into the distance.
At least I am alive...

It quickly becomes apparent that the dragon is more powerful than [From.GetBestName], and [From.GetSheHe] is wounded several times.

"I shall spare your life this time, despite your attack on me," she suddenly says, inflicting one final wound before leaping into the air quite gracefully. "Until we meet again!"

With that, she flies off into the distance.
At least [From.GetSheHe] survived...
At least she didn't hurt me...
The Champion of Justice

I hear the sound of alarm bells ringing and behold a silvery dragon with two large wings and a body that certainly cannot be described as serpentine coming towards the Lunar New Year celebration, landing quite gracefully near where you are standing.

"I am Icava, the Champion of Justice," the dragon says, the voice feminine. "I have no quarrel with you, [Root.GetBestName]. Instead, I seek a great evil." She turns around and looks over your guests, eventually fixing her eyes on her target.

"[smite_evil_target.GetBestName], the time has come to answer for your many crimes!"
I will allow this challenge!

The battle is a close thing, but eventually [smite_evil_target.GetBestName] seems to be getting the upper hand and [smite_evil_target.GetSheHe] starts driving the dragon back.\n\n"It seems I shall have to choose the better part of valor," she suddenly says, leaping into the air quite gracefully and flying off.
Perhaps the dragon was mistaken?

It quickly becomes apparent that the dragon is more powerful than I am and she easily inflicts several heavy wounds on me.\n\n"For crimes such as yours, there can be no forgiveness," she suddenly says, lunging forward and inflicting a mortal wound.
Not like this!

It quickly becomes apparent that the dragon is more powerful than [smite_evil_target.GetBestName] is and she inflicts several heavy wounds on [smite_evil_target.GetHerHim].\n\n"For crimes such as yours, there can be no forgiveness," the dragon suddenly says, lunging forward and inflicting a mortal wound.

The Champion's Gift

I hear the sound of alarm bells ringing and fear an attack of some kind on the Lunar New Year celebration, but instead a silvery dragon with two large wings approaches the celebration and lands nearby in a very graceful manner.\n\n"I am Icava, the Champion of Justice," the dragon says, the voice feminine. "[Root.GetBestName], with the evil dragon Fredak, the so-called 'Emperor of Embers', I fear for the safety of those as virtuous as you." She reaches out and gently places a sword on the ground just in front of me. "I grant you Gram. It should help with any draconic attacks on you and yours."
I gladly accept this boon!
The Champion's Gift

I hear the sound of alarm bells ringing and fear an attack of some kind on the Lunar New Year celebration, but instead a silvery dragon with two large wings approaches the celebration and lands nearby in a very graceful manner.\n\n"I am Icava, the Champion of Justice," the dragon says, the voice feminine. "[From.GetBestName], with the evil dragon Fredak, the so-called 'Emperor of Embers', I fear for the safety of those as virtuous as you." She reaches out and gently places a sword on the ground just in front of [From.GetBestName]. "I gift grant Gram. It should help with any draconic attacks on you and yours."
A magnificient gift!

The Lunar New Year celebration is disturbed by the arrival of a messenger who comes riding in from elsewhere in [Root.Capital.GetName].\n\n"There has been a dragon sighted in the distance!" the messenger proclaims. "It was huge, red, and not remotely serpentine."
May it stay far away!

The Lunar New Year celebration is disturbed by the arrival of a messenger who comes riding in from elsewhere in [From.Capital.GetName].\n\n"There has been a dragon sighted in the distance!" the messenger proclaims. "It was huge, red, and not remotely serpentine."
May it stay far away!

Alarm bells and screams of terror interrupt the Lunar New Year celebration in [Root.Capital.GetName]. Looking to the sky, I can see a massive red dragon with two huge wings and a body that is certainly not serpentine. It seems Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, has come. Luckily, he seems to merely be passing by.
Too close for comfort...

Alarm bells and screams of terror interrupt the Lunar New Year celebration in [From.Capital.GetName]. Looking to the sky, I can see a massive red dragon with two huge wings and a body that is certainly not serpentine. It seems Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, has come. Luckily, he seems to merely be passing by.
Too close for comfort...

I hear a fearsome roar in the distance and alarm bells ringing throughout [Root.Capital.GetName]. Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, has come, seemingly intent on interrupting the Lunar New Year celebration. As I watch the approach of the red dragon, several arrows and bolts launched at it seem to strike true, and it roars out one last time before turning around.
Good thing I hired those guards!

I hear a fearsome roar in the distance and alarm bells ringing throughout [From.Capital.GetName]. Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, has come, seemingly intent on interrupting the Lunar New Year celebration. As I watch the approach of the red dragon, several arrows and bolts launched at it seem to strike true, and it roars out one last time before turning around.
He can be driven off, it seems...

Word has reached me that the fearsome red dragon Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, sought to attack a Lunar New Year celebration in [From.Capital.GetName] but that the defenders there managed to drive it off. It is likely that the beast has retreated to its lair to recover.
It might be weakened, for now...
The Emperor of Embers

I am enjoying the Lunar New Year celebration when I suddenly hear a ferocious roar in the distance and the sound of alarm bells being ringing. Soon, smoke is rising nearby, lit by fires from below. Suddenly, a colossal red dragon with two massive wings appears, landing on top of a building nearby, its weight causing the building to partially collapse.\n\n"Little humans," the dragon says in a deep, masculine voice. "I am Fredak, the Emperor of Embers. COWER before me and give up your treasures, or you will all BURN, as will this city!"
I have no choice but to prostrate myself...
To arms! We can fight it!
The Emperor of Embers

I am enjoying the Lunar New Year celebration when I suddenly hear a ferocious roar in the distance and the sound of alarm bells being ringing. Soon, smoke is rising nearby, lit by fires from below. Suddenly, a colossal red dragon with two massive wings appears, landing on top of a building nearby, its weight causing the building to partially collapse.\n\n"Little humans," the dragon says in a deep, masculine voice. "I am Fredak, the Emperor of Embers. COWER before me and give up your treasures, or you will all BURN, as will this city!"
Is it even possible to fight it?
The Emperor of Embers

Word has reached me that a mighty red dragon calling itself Fredak, the Emperor of Embers has attacked the Lunar New Year celebration in [dragon_attack_capital.GetName]. It is still unknown where the beast came from, but its fury is not to be underestimated.

As it is unknown what caused the dragon to attack [From.GetBestName]'s Lunar New Year celebration, it is hard to say if the dragon might attack someone else in the future.

Should the location of its lair be determined, perhaps someone could even consider gathering some companions to try to slay the beast...
I need to look over my defenses...

Within days of the dragon attack on the Lunar New Year celebration in [dragon_attack_capital.GetName] a messenger arrives to inform me that the same dragon has been sighted in [dragons_lair_province.GetName]. The province has been extensively devastated and it is said that the dragon's lair can be found in a cave in the province.
Here be dragons...

Within days of the dragon attack on the Lunar New Year celebration in [dragon_attack_capital.GetName] a messenger arrives to inform me that the same dragon has been sighted in [dragons_lair_province.GetName]. The province has been extensively devastated and it is said that the dragon's lair can be found in a cave in the province.
There, there be dragons...

I shall spare your lives for now, little humans, so that you may amuse me by offering further tributes, the dragon says as I prostrate myself in front of it and call for my servants to bring out as much gold as they can find. The dragon takes all he can carry and flies off.
Better to bow than to burn...

I shall spare your lives for now, little humans, so that you may amuse me by offering further tributes, the dragon says as [From.GetBestName] prostrates [From.GetHerselfHimself] in front of it. I and the other guests quickly follow suit as servants bring out gold and other valuables for the dragon to carry off.
I suppose it is for the best...

Instead of calling for everyone to lay down their arms and try to placate the dragon [From.GetBestName] draws [From.GetHerHis] weapon.\n\n"To arms! We can fight it!" [From.GetSheHe] shouts, clearly hoping for assistance as [From.GetSheHe] charges at the beast.
I will help slay the beast!
This is not my fight...
A Clash of Steel and Flame

I and some of my guests draw our weapons and charge at the dragon, with various guards and even some of the servants joining in.

Though I feared for the worst, it seems our attacks are having an impact, as Fredak's roars turn more pained over time, and I start to feel that I might be victorious.

"Enjoy your temporary victory, insects!" the dragon suddenly roars, leaping into the air, seemingly with some difficulty. "I will return, and [dragon_attack_capital.GetName] will BURN that day!" With that, Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, flies off into the distance.
Begone, foul beast!
A Clash of Steel and Flame

[From.GetBestName], I, and some of the other guests draw our weapons and charge at the dragon, with various guards and even some of the servants joining in.

Though I feared for the worst, it seems our attacks are having an impact, as Fredak's roars turn more pained over time, and you start to feel that you might be victorious.

"Enjoy your temporary victory, insects!" the dragon suddenly roars, leaping into the air, seemingly with some difficulty. "I will return, and [dragon_attack_capital.GetName] will BURN that day!" With that, Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, flies off into the distance.
I knew we could do it!

I and some of the other guests that decided not to try to fight Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, find cover where we may. We fear for the worst as the sounds of battle continue, but eventually they are replaced with cheers, and when we finally make our way back to [From.GetBestName] we find that the dragon is gone.
I suppose that worked...

Word has arrived from the court of [From.GetBestName] that the dragon Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, was successfully fought off when he attacked the Lunar New Year Celebration in [From.Capital.GetName]. It is likely that the beast has retreated to its lair to recover, as it survived its defeat.
Perhaps it is time to hunt it down...
The Burning of [Root.Capital.GetName]

I attack Fredak, the Emperor of Ember alongside those that decided to join me, fighting with every weapon we can bring to bear. Though it takes a while for the battle to come to an end, it ends with our defeat. While those that fought the dragon are wounded, crippled, dead, or dying, it appears to be largely unharmed.

"I warned you not to defy me, little insects," the dragon says, its expression twisting into a cruel smile. "Now, [dragon_attack_capital.GetName] shall BURN!"

It leaps into the air and flies off, and the screams rising in the distance grow worse as it unleashes its fury.
It is even possible to slay it?
The Burning of [From.Capital.GetName]

I attack Fredak, the Emperor of Embers alongside [From.GetBestName] and those that decided to join us, fighting with every weapon we can bring to bear. "I warned you not to defy me, little insects," the dragon says, its expression twisting into a cruel smile. "Now, [dragon_attack_capital.GetName] shall BURN!"

It leaps into the air and flies off, and the screams rising in the distance grow worse as it unleashes its fury.

I find what cover I can as the fight against Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, begins. I hope and pray that things will turn out for the best and that the dragon will be driven off or even killed, but it is not to be. Without warning, my shelter comes under attack. It seems the dragon has won.
Why did they try to fight it?

Refugees are fleeing from [dragon_attack_capital.GetName] in the wake of the attack by Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, bringing with them tales of terror. Apparently, [From.GetBestName] decided to fight the dragon and failed to prevail, causing it to burn the province to such an extent that little but ashes remain.
The same must never happen here!
The Emperor of Embers

I hear the sound of alarm bells and look to the sky, knowing what I will see even before I spot the massive red dragon that is coming towards my Lunar New Year celebration, undeterred by the arrows and bolts that fly up to meet it. Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, lands nearby, with the building he lands on crumbling beneath him.\n\n"I am sure you have heard of me, little human," the dragon growls at me. "COWER before me and give me your treasure, or you and your capital will BURN! So say I, Fredak, the Emperor of Embers!"
Defiance would only result in death...
It is time to end this terror!

The Burning of [Root.Capital.GetName]

I attack Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, alongside some of my guests, guards, and servants that decided to join me, fighting with every weapon we can bring to bear. I fail to defeat the dragon. Those that fought the dragon are wounded, crippled, dead, or dying, and it appears to be largely unharmed.\n\n"I warned you not to defy me, little insects," the dragon says, its expression twisting into a cruel smile. "Now, [dragon_attack_capital.GetName] shall BURN!". It leaps into the air and flies off, and the smoke and screams rising in the distance grow worse as it unleashes its fury.
This is the price of our defiance...
The Burning of [From.Capital.GetName]

I attack Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, alongside [From.GetBestName], and some of the other guests, guards, and servants that decided to join us, fighting with every weapon we can bring to bear. We fail to defeat the dragon. Those that fought the dragon are wounded, crippled, dead, or dying, and it appears to be largely unharmed.\n\n"I warned you not to defy me, little insects," the dragon says, its expression twisting into a cruel smile. "Now, [dragon_attack_capital.GetName] shall BURN!". It leaps into the air and flies off, and the smoke and screams rising in the distance grow worse as it unleashes its fury.
We could not prevail in the end...

I find what cover I can as the fight against Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, begins. I hope and pray that things will turn out for the best and that the dragon will be driven off or even killed, but it is not to be. Without warning, my shelter comes under attack. It seems the dragon has won.
Could anyone stop THAT?

Refugees are fleeing from [dragon_attack_capital.GetName] in the wake of the attack by Fredak, the Emperor of Embers, bringing with them tales of terror. Apparently, [From.GetBestName] decided to fight the dragon and failed to prevail, causing it to burn the province to such an extent that little but ashes remain.
Its fury is most fearsome...

An expected part of the Lunar New Year celebration is the dragon dance, but while [From.GetBestName] has not gone so far as to skip it entirely there is but one rather small dragon to be found. I had expected qutie a bit more, to tell the truth.
Most inauspicious!
I shouldn't complain...

It seems [From.GetBestName] did not like the dragon dance during my Lunar New Yer celebration, and [From.GetHerHis] words seem to have agitated the other guests as well. While there is a dragon, it seems as if it was rather unsatisfactory.
There is always someone complaining...

I am watching the rather paltry dragon dance at [FromFrom.GetBestName]'s Lunar New Year celebration finding it rather unsatisfactory when [From.GetBestName] suddenly sees fit to complain about it in front of everyone. Everyone else seems to be joining in, so I might as well.
Most inauspicious!

The dragon dance at the Lunar New Year celebration in [Root.Capital.GetBestName] is perhaps not as grand as it might have been with multiple dragons being part of it, but it is still a dragon dance and thus quite pleasant to look at.
I like it!

The dragon dance at the Lunar New Year celebration in [From.Capital.GetBestName] is perhaps not as grand as it might have been with multiple dragons being part of it, but it is still a dragon dance and thus quite pleasant to look at.
I like it!

Having multiple troupes of dragon dancers as part of the Lunar New Year celebration is usually better than having just one, but it seems like the dragon dancers in [Root.Capital.GetName] are not skilled enough to handle multiple dragons as the dragon dance has to be interrupted several times in order to untangle the dragons from one another.
Inauspicious!

Having multiple troupes of dragon dancers as part of the Lunar New Year celebration is usually better than having just one, but it seems like the dragon dancers in [From.Capital.GetName] are not skilled enough to handle multiple dragons as the dragon dance has to be interrupted several times in order to untangle the dragons from one another.
Inauspicious!

The two troupes of dragon dancers at the Lunar New Year celebration in [Root.Capital.GetName] are quite skilled, and I rather enjoy the sight of the two dragons as they dance both separately and intertwined throughout the celebrations, with the troupes skillfully avoiding having the dragons get tangled up.
Auspicious!

The two troupes of dragon dancers at the Lunar New Year celebration in [From.Capital.GetName] are quite skilled, and I rather enjoy the sight of the two dragons as they dance both separately and intertwined throughout the celebrations, with the troupes skillfully avoiding having the dragons get tangled up.
Auspicious!
A Dance of Nine Dragons

One troupe of dragon dancers is to be expected at a Lunar New Year celebration. Two troupe is much rarer, and even rarer is a dragon dance featuring the full nine dragons, but the dancers in [Root.Capital.GetName] are skilled enough to pull it off.\n\nSome of them separate from the rest every now and then to head out on their own to make sure that as many people as possible get to see a dragon dance, but they sooner or later come back to where I am standing and dance with the rest of the dragons, both separately and intertwined in a manner that only the best troupes are capable of pulling off without the dragons getting tangled up with one another.
Most auspicious!
A Dance of Nine Dragons

One troupe of dragon dancers is to be expected at a Lunar New Year celebration. Two troupe is much rarer, and even rarer is a dragon dance featuring the full nine dragons, but the dancers in [From.Capital.GetName] are skilled enough to pull it off.\n\nSome of them separate from the rest every now and then to head out on their own to make sure that as many people as possible get to see a dragon dance, but they sooner or later come back to where I am standing and dance with the rest of the dragons, both separately and intertwined in a manner that only the best troupes are capable of pulling off without the dragons getting tangled up with one another.
Most auspicious!
A Girl Worth Fighting Alongside?

The dragon dance in [Root.Capital.GetName] is rather pleasant to look at, but as I am watching it some of the dragon dancers suddenly draw weapons and run into the crowd, dragging several important townspeople into a building while shouting various contradictory demands that have to be met before the hostages are released.

One of my guards brings ne a young woman named [a_girl_worth_fighting_alongside.GetFullName], who drops to her knees before speaking.

"My [Root.GetLordLady], I know how to safely get your guards into that building to rescue the hostages," she says. "Please, put me in charge of the rescue mission."
I trust you to handle this!
Get away from me, silly girl!
A Girl Worth Fighting Alongside?

The dragon dance in [From.Capital.GetName] is rather pleasant to look at, but as I am watching it some of the dragon dancers suddenly draw weapons and run into the crowd, dragging several important townspeople into a building while shouting various contradictory demands that have to be met before the hostages are released.\n\n[From.GetBestName] suddenly calls for volunteers to go on a rescue mission under the command of [a_girl_worth_fighting_alongside.GetFullName], a young girl who apparently has managed to convince [From.GetBestName] that she is the right person to handle the hostage situation.
I'll help her!
Help a peasant girl? Ha!
I'd rather not...
A Girl Worth Fighting Alongside

[a_girl_worth_fighting_alongside.GetFullName] leads my guards and some volunteers from among my guests into the building the bandits took the hostages to through a passageway through the cellar from an adjacent building. She and the others come out through the main entrance with all of the hostages and with several captured bandits a short while later, with several people praising her for her quick thinking and how well she fought.
I knew she could do it!
A Girl Worth Fighting Alongside

[a_girl_worth_fighting_alongside.GetFullName] leads me, my fellow volunteers, and some guards into the building to which the hostages were taken through a secret passage leading into the cellar. We fight your way up floor by floor, with the young woman decisively leading us to victory, killing several of the bandits when they are foolish enough to stand in her way. By the time that we the building nobody has anything but praise for her.
With you on our side, victory is certain!
A Girl Worth Fighting Alongside

I wait with [From.GetBestName] and the others that did not choose to go with [a_girl_worth_fighting_alongside.GetFullName] as she enters the building leading a small group of guards and volunteers. Sounds of fighting soom can be heard from the building the bandits entered, and before long [a_girl_worth_fighting_alongside.GetFullName] comes out through the main entrance with all the hostages accounted for and everyone who fought at her side praising her and her skills.
That worked?
A Girl Not Worth Fighting Alongside

[a_girl_worth_fighting_alongside.GetFullName] enters the building the bandits took the hostages to with some guards and volunteers. I hear fighting going on inside the building for a while and hope for good news, but soon [a_girl_worth_fighting_alongside.GetFullName] and some of the volunteers can be seen jumping out the windows to the relative safety outside. By the time that the guards get inside the hostages are all dead.
She has failed me!
A Girl Not Worth Fighting Alongside

[a_girl_worth_fighting_alongside.GetFullName] enters the building the bandits took the hostages to with me and some others following her. We immediately encounter fierce resistance, with several guards dying before we clear the first room. The resistance does not let up, and soon we are all forced to jump out the nearest window to escape. You later learn that most of the bandits got away and that none of the hostages survived.
It was her fault!
A Girl Not Worth Fighting Alongside

I watch as [a_girl_worth_fighting_alongside.GetFullName] leads the guards and the volunteers inside the building the bandits entered with their hostages and wonder how well it will go. I soon have my answer as [a_girl_worth_fighting_alongside.GetFullName] and various other people are forced to escape through the windows, and when the guards finally manage to get into the building they discover that all of the hostages were found dead.
Hardly surprising!

Though I feared that my guards might not be able to handle the bandits well enough to ensure that they all got killed or captured and also feared that they might not be able to save the hostages I am pleased to learn that they are up to the task. It seems [a_girl_worth_fighting_alongside.GetFullName]'s assistance was not something I needed.
The guards handled it well

Fireworks are an expected part of the Lunar New Year celebration, and [From.GetTitledName] has prepared a few that are fired off during the celebration. They are not particularly impressive, as even some of the townsfolk in [From.Capital.GetName] seem to have managed to outdo the display with ease.
Most inauspicious!
I'd rather not complain...

It seems [From.GetTitledName] did not enjoy the fireworks at my Lunar New Year celebration as [From.GetSheHe] can be heard complaining loudly. Even worse, my other guests soon start voicing their own complaints, suggesting that I have a poor grasp of what is right and proper.
Perhaps I should have gotten more...

The fireworks at [FromFrom.GetTitledName]'s are not particularly impressive, and when [From.GetTitledName] decides to complain about it I see fit to follow suit. After all, even some of the townspeople in [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] seem to have managed to outdo [From.GetTitledName] with ease, judging by other fireworks nearby.
Most inauspicious!

The fireworks I bought for my Lunar New Year celebration are perhaps not as impressive as they could have been if I had decided to invest some more money, but they are certainly more than adequate, and I find myself enjoying them quite a bit.
That was rather nice

The fireworks at [From.GetBestName]'s Lunar New Year celebration are perhaps not as impressive as they could have been if [From.GetSheHe] had decided to invest some more money, but they are certainly more than adequate, and I find myself enjoying them quite a bit.
That was rather nice

As my Lunar New Year celebration nears its end the fireworks I bought are lit and the sky comes alight thanks to the multi-colored sparks released by the fireworks. The Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac] is beginning in style.
Auspicious!

As [From.GetBestName]'s Lunar New Year celebration nears its end a large number of fireworks are lit and the sky comes alight thanks to the multi-colored sparks released by the fireworks. The Year of the [From.GetNewElement] [From.GetNewZodiac] is beginning in style.
Auspicious!
The Grand Fireworks Display

The sky is lit by colorful explosions as the fireworks I bought for the Lunar New Year celebration are lit to celebrate the end of the Year of the [Root.GetOldElement] [Root.GetOldZodiac] and the start of the Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac]. Some of the townsfolk are lighting their own fireworks, but they are insignificant next to mine.\n\nI watch the show with a smile on your lips, satisfied with the knowledge that there should be no reason for anyone to complain about the fireworks due to the magnificience of the display.
Most auspicious!
The Grand Fireworks Display

The sky is lit by colorful explosions as the fireworks at [From.GetBestName]'s Lunar New Year celebration are lit to celebrate the end of the Year of the [From.GetOldElement] [From.GetOldZodiac] and the start of the Year of the [From.GetNewElement] [From.GetNewZodiac]. Some of the townsfolk are lighting their own fireworks, but they are barely worthy of the name.\n\nI have heard of firework displays that could compete with the one you are witnessing in perhaps one or two other places, but even if they could, there is no denying [From.GetBestName]'s fireworks are magnificient.
Most auspicious!

The Lunar New Year celebration has come to an end, and with it the Year of the [Root.GetOldElement] [Root.GetOldZodiac]. The Year of the [Root.GetNewElement] [Root.GetNewZodiac] has begun, and it is time to tend to other matters.
Wishing you prosperity!

[From.GetBestName]'s Lunar New Year celebration has come to an end, and with it the Year of the [From.GetOldElement] [From.GetOldZodiac]. The Year of the [From.GetNewElement] [From.GetNewZodiac] has begun, and it is time to tend to other matters.
Wishing you prosperity!
Due to a war breaking out it has become clear that I will need to cancel my Lunar New Year celebration to focus my attention elsewhere.
Unfortunate
A message has arrived from [From.GetBestName], informing me that the Lunar New Year celebration will not be taking place as planned due to a war breaking out.
Unfortunate
